variants.Description in input context: This variant results in a structural change, possibly affecting the protein's function.

Readout description.Result Description: The intensity of fluorescence was decreased by 30% for the variant NM_014793.5:c.106C>T in NSC-34 cells.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for each sample.

Technical replicates.Description: Each technical replicate was repeated three times to ensure consistency.

Basic positive control.Description: Healthy neuronal cells were used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Not applicable, as a true negative control was not provided in the literature.

Validation controls B/LB.Description: Not applicable, as no true benign controls were provided in the literature.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: One-way ANOVA with Tukey's HSD post hoc test was used to compare the fluorescence intensities between groups.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Fluorescence intensity greater than or equal to the median of healthy neuronal cells.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Fluorescence intensity less than the first quartile of healthy neuronal cells.
